HAML.TA.summary: Ham-Let (Israel-Canada) Ltd. manufactures and sells instrumentation valves and fittings worldwide. It offers fittings, such as let-lok and one-lok tube, dielectric, pipe, flare, and UH line fittings; instrumentation process valves comprising ball, needle, plug, toggle, metering, check, relief, and excess flow valves; and hightech components, including glands, mini buttwelds, swivel connectors, long weld shaped connectors, and gaskets, as well as caps, nuts, and plugs. The company also provides ultra-clean valves, which include ultra-fast, high and low pressure, metering, vacuum generator, multi-port monoblock, and surface mount valves; HPA actuators, mounting kits, and accessories; and manifolds and related accessories. In addition, it offers body, SESO, DESO, body protector, and stem protector quick connectors; filters; metal, PTFE, and rubber hoses; sample cylinders; pressure gauges; and HHP fittings, adapters, and needle valves. Further, the company provides application consulting services comprising engineering and application support services; and professional training services. Its products have applications in oil and gas, semiconductor, power generation, process instrumentation, solar energy, pulp and paper, food and beverage, chemical, pharmaceutical, analytical instrumentation, and hydrogen fuel cells and natural gas industries. Ham-Let (Israel-Canada) Ltd. was incorporated in 1961 and is based in Nazereth Illit, Israel.
